overview: A scathing portrait of the Hollywood/LA arts milieu of the late 70â€™s, Chameleon follows the amorphous day of its lead character, an Armani-jacketed peddler of high-class dope, fraudulent art, and preening postures suited-to-fit the changing victims, though as with all such fakery, the real victim in the long run is the person who lives such a life.
title: Chameleon
